column4: UPDATE 2-Bad code update triggered Yahoo  Bing search crash-source
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 2 Yahoo Inc and Microsoft Corp search engines temporarily went dark on Friday after Microsoft pushed out a bad code update and then struggled to roll it back  a person briefed on the outages told Reuters.

column4: Vuzix says received Intel investment for smart glasses
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Vuzix Corporation said on Friday that Intel Corp invested $24.8 million in the company to speed up the launch of Internet-connected eyewear.
